content: संस्कृ {c8c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To adorn, grace, decorate; ककुभं समस्कुरुत माघवनीं <ls>Śi. 9. 25.</ls> {@--2@} To refine, polish; वाण्येका समलंकसोति पुरुषं या संस्कृता धार्यते <ls>Bh. 2. 19</ls>; <ls>Śi. 14. 50.</ls> {@--3@} To consecrate by repeating Mantras; <ls>Ms. 5. 36.</ls> {@--4@} To purify (a person) by scriptural ceremonies, perform purificatory ceremonies over (a person); संचस्कारोमयप्रीत्या मैथिलेयौ यथाविधि <ls>R. 15. 31</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 124.</ls> {@--5@} To cultivate, educate, train; आर्योपदेशसंस्कियमाणमतयः <ls>Mu. 3.</ls> {@--6@} To make ready, prepare, equip, fit out; <ls>Mu. 3.</ls> {@--7@} To cook, dress (food.) {@--8@} To purify, cleanse. {@--9@} To collect, heap together. {@--10@} To construct, form well or thoroughly.
